result.eng: I love traditional music.

result.eng: Ráidió na Gaeltachta doesn't play music in English.
result.ga: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta
result.orig: Ní chastar ceol as Béarla ar Raidió na Gaeltachta

result.eng: They are playing music.

result.orig: Tá siad ag seinm ceoil

result.eng: She has an interest in music.

result.ponchtml: Tá suim aici sa ċeolShe has an interest in music.

result.eng: They have the best traditional music there.

result.eng: Do you play music at school?

result.eng: Where do you [usually] play your music?

result.eng: There are a couple of pubs there, and there are often music sessions on at the weekend.
result.ga: Tá cúpla teach tábhairne ann agus bíonn seisiúin cheoil ar siúl ag an deireadh seachtaine
